- - - Updated - - -

MY MODEL

PART

{

 url = ENERGIA/ENERGIA/BLOCK\_AM/Energia\_BlockAM

 DRAG\_CUBE

 {

 cube = Default,

STOCK MODEL

PART

{

 url = Squad/Parts/Utility/parachuteMk25/parachuteMk25/parachuteDrogue

 DRAG\_CUBE

 {

 cube = PACKED, 

 cube = SEMIDEPLOYED,

 cube = DEPLOYED, 

It will be necessary to separate the parachute check.

Which version of Unity are you using?

I just want to say ... this looks so amazing. I started a similar idea with the Block A, but seeing you do it, I think yours is going to be perfect anyway. lol

But maybe if you have problems with the parachutes, you could incorporate them as a separate part.

> 
> Which version of Unity are you using?

4.2.1f4

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I just want to say ... this looks so amazing. I started a similar idea with the Block A, but seeing you do it, I think yours is going to be perfect anyway. lol
> But maybe if you have problems with the parachutes, you could incorporate them as a separate part.

Do not stop, to do what you want !!!

The good news about the Buran. The manipulator is now working, though for it to work you need three plugin, KAS / KIS / MagicSmokeIndustries, but it's worth it.

[![9423701_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1438193299/b3ad6e3d/9423701_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/b3ad6e3d9423701.html)

And new work on the docking station is not ready to say exactly, but the first attempt is not broken Shuttle, Buran today declared a disco. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[![9423758_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1438193549/d676f4ec/9423758_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/d676f4ec9423758.html)
that is honestly looking incredible, great job!

Great job, DECQ! I'm excited about a full release of this.

Would it be possible to make an RSS/RO version? (Scaled up, with realistic propellants if RO)

> 
> Great job, DECQ! I'm excited about a full release of this.
> Would it be possible to make an RSS/RO version? (Scaled up, with realistic propellants if RO)

Energia is connected to the RSS / RO, and flies pretty good.

Over Buran I have not started working, i must first solve the nuances of it.

> 
> Energia is connected to the RSS / RO, and flies pretty good.
> Over Buran I have not started working, i must first solve the nuances of it.

 Okay. Will you also be making APAS docking ports so we can attach Buran to space stations properly?

> 
> Okay. Will you also be making APAS docking ports so we can attach Buran to space stations properly?

Well, so far the docking station works well, although I'll check it again.

> 
> Well, so far the docking station works well, although I'll check it again.

I think he meant a docking port part to attach on stations and other stuff to get it to work with Buran

like Kristall's APAS

> 
> Okay. Will you also be making APAS docking ports so we can attach Buran to space stations properly?

Oh, I have not seen the English version of your post, I have a separate version of the docking port (APAS), and even some parts of the stations, it will take a lot of time to work on them, but I will put a docking port release, especially for you .

> 
> Oh, I have not seen the English version of your post, I have a separate version of the docking port (APAS), and even some parts of the stations, it will take a lot of time to work on them, but I will put a docking port release, especially for you .

 Thanks!
I love this fascination with Buran! This project looks great!

Some new images.

Although this thread is dedicated mainly Buran I work in different areas related to the project "Energia"

For example the project "SAUSAGE" Energia\_2 (You will not believe, but if you try a little bit, this a monster fly)).

[![9461785_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1438539567/00100b59/9461785_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/00100b599461785.html)

[![9461792_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1438539633/2c071505/9461792_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/2c0715059461792.html)

[![9461798_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1438539710/f4fa7d09/9461798_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/f4fa7d099461798.html)

Or blocks for the stations, of course for the Buran.Are very small, but they will be replenished.

[![9461819_m.png](http://images.vfl.ru/ii/1438539900/7eab66f7/9461819_m.png)](http://vfl.ru/fotos/7eab66f79461819.html)

Also container payload "Buran-T" altered Block DM / tornado, block A for Vulkan / Energia-M, Pole

Perhaps because of the stretch on a number of projects this addon long release, I thank all who are waiting for this add-on, I hope you have the patience to wait until the release.

 Awesome. Will totally use that Energia!
Any plans for a Zenit?

> 
> Awesome. Will totally use that Energia!
> Any plans for a Zenit?

at the moment, there is no where else has had a wonderful add-on Zenith).
amazing, what about boost power control , will it be like the us shuttle us a plugin or by weight?

> 
> amazing, what about boost power control , will it be like the us shuttle us a plugin or by weight?

I think not, because first of all the add-on dedicated to Rocket "ENERGIA", and it will be in orbit about 60-80t in stock mode.

> 
> I think not, because first of all the add-on dedicated to Rocket "ENERGIA", and it will be in orbit about 60-80t in stock mode.

wow now i'm really exciting about this, looking forward to fly if, and build a nice station!!![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

You've got me sold on that Energia-2, beautiful model man. Funnily enough, the day you posted those pics I was attempting to make her out of procedural parts in RSS/RO. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)[http://imgur.com/a/9rmgk](http://imgur.com/a/9rmgk)

God are the station screenies gorgeous! God!

Incredible work, good sir!

> 
> wow now i'm really exciting about this, looking forward to fly if, and build a nice station!!![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

And yet Rocket looks promising with RSS/RO, in my opinion it would be much more useful to them.
